scripts.validate: pnpm lint && pnpm format:check && pnpm type-check
scripts.setup:localnet: pnpm account:gen && pnpm faucet localnet && pnpm run deploy localnet && pnpm run config:store localnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite localnet &)
scripts.setup:testnet: pnpm account:gen && pnpm check-balance testnet && pnpm run deploy testnet && pnpm run config:store testnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite testnet &)
scripts.setup:mainnet: pnpm account:gen && pnpm check-balance mainnet && pnpm run deploy mainnet && pnpm run config:store mainnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite mainnet &)
scripts.prod:localnet: pnpm config:store localnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite localnet &) && pnpm next
scripts.prod:testnet: pnpm config:store testnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite testnet &) && pnpm next
scripts.prod:mainnet: pnpm config:store mainnet && (pnpm run indexer:sqlite mainnet &) && pnpm next
